about_the_game:
Do you have what it takes to become the next President of the United States? Plot your way through an American political campaign as you go head-to-head against a rival political party. Make tough decisions as you travel across the country and try to earn enough votes to become the next President of the United States!

Campaign Mode:

The campaign mode features a thrilling turn-based experience as you counter every move that your opponent makes. Fly to battleground states and conduct polls to see whether you're leading or losing ground. Host political rallies and launch campaign advertisements to try and sway the opinions of undecided voters. Come face to face with your opponent in policy debates, where the fate of the race could hang in the balance.

Spend your time wisely in battleground states to try and carve a pathway to winning the electoral college. Avoid gaffes and embarrassing mistakes while on the campaign trail and try to force your opponent into making unforced errors. Do you have what it takes to win the election and become the next President of the United States?

Election Night:

When the campaign is over, you can experience the intense swings of an American election night. View election results in real-time as the votes are tabulated and watch the results come in for all fifty states throughout the night.

Customization:

Customize your candidate and represent a major political party. Pick from more than four decades of electoral maps, and take a step back into history by adjusting voter turnout to match elections from the past.

Game Features:
  • Steam Leaderboards
  • Steam Achievements
